title: Halo Combat Evolved Registry Entries
description:
Instructions:

1. Download
2. Edit file, change "EXE Path" to the appropriate path (eg: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo Combat Evolved)
3. Double click / open, allow registry entries to be added.

That's it, then you will be able to update to Halo 1.09.

For Halo Custom Edition, change "[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftMicrosoft GamesHalo]" to "[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftMicrosoft GamesHalo Custom Edition]" or "[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftMicrosoft GamesHalo CE]" and the "EXE Path"
